    • initializeBoard

      public void initializeBoard(int nPlayers)
      Set number of player Initialize the board by setting N.A. tiles depending on the number of players Fill completely the board Update board Set common goal cards
      Parameters:
      nPlayers - number of player

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard()
      update board every time a round end Update "catchableTiles" matrix check if the matrix is to be filled (if true fill the board)

    • chooseTiles

      public List<Tile> chooseTiles(Integer i1, Integer j1) throws InvalidChoiceException
      The player catches 1 tile, check if the move is allowed
      Parameters:
      i1 - row
      j1 - column
      Returns:
      list of tile taken
      Throws:
      InvalidChoiceException - the tile is not catchable

    • chooseTiles

      public List<Tile> chooseTiles(Integer i1, Integer j1, Integer i2, Integer j2, Bookshelf shelf) throws InvalidChoiceException
      The player catches 2 tiles, check if the move is allowed
      Parameters:
      i1 - row first tile
      j1 - column first tile
      i2 - row second tile
      j2 - column second tile
      shelf - bookshelf of the player
      Returns:
      list of the tiles taken
      Throws:
      InvalidChoiceException - one or more tiles are not catchable, the player has no enough space in his bookshelf for 2 tiles or the tiles are not in line

    • inLine

      protected boolean inLine(int i1, int j1, int i2, int j2)

    • chooseTiles

      public List<Tile> chooseTiles(Integer i1, Integer j1, Integer i2, Integer j2, Integer i3, Integer j3, Bookshelf shelf) throws InvalidChoiceException
      The player catches 3 tiles, check if the move is allowed
      Parameters:
      i1 - row first tile
      j1 - column first tile
      i2 - row second tile
      j2 - column second tile
      i3 - row third tile
      j3 - column third tile
      shelf - bookshelf of the player
      Returns:
      list of the tiles taken
      Throws:
      InvalidChoiceException - one or more tiles are not catchable, the player has no enough space in his bookshelf for 3 tiles or tiles are not in line
